pullrequest.title: Share vertices when loading a collada mesh, improve loader performance

content.raw:
Update:

Added changes allow more vertices to be reused by checking position, normal, texcoord values (as opposed to just indices).

[Changes here](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/e425b4a..31cb2ec#commits)

- Coordless drill: No change in the final number of vertices. Still no duplicates found.
- ISS: Reused 70k+ vertices (previously 0)
content.html:
Update:

Added changes allow more vertices to be reused by checking position, normal, texcoord values (as opposed to just indices).

Changes here

  • Coordless drill: No change in the final number of vertices. Still no duplicates found.
  • ISS: Reused 70k+ vertices (previously 0)
